sentinelone_user_config.name: SentinelOne User Config
sentinelone_user_config.description: Retrieve SentinelOne user records and produce summary analysis (admin counts, 2FA, last login).
sentinelone_user_config.instructions: Script: userfetcher.py. Calls the SentinelOne API endpoint /web/api/v2.1/users using ApiToken authorization, pages with cursor, and writes JSON and CSV summary.

validationRules.logic: IF record_count >= 0 THEN PASS (ensures script returned numeric count)

sentinelone_xdr_assets.name: SentinelOne XDR Assets
sentinelone_xdr_assets.description: Retrieve XDR asset inventory (containers, images, cloud resources) and summary counts.
sentinelone_xdr_assets.instructions: Script: xdrassetfetcher.py. Calls the SentinelOne API endpoint /web/api/v2.1/xdr/assets, supports cursor pagination, summarizes infectionStatus and assetStatus, writes JSON and CSV summary.

sentinelone_agents.name: SentinelOne Agents
sentinelone_agents.description: Retrieve agents information, containerized workload counts, cloud provider metadata, and optional agent counts endpoint.
sentinelone_agents.instructions: Script: agentfetcher.py. Calls /web/api/v2.1/agents (and /web/api/v2.1/agents/count), pages with cursor, collects cluster names and container/pod counts, writes JSON and CSV summary.

validationRules.logic: IF reported_agent_count is null or reported_agent_count >= 0 THEN PASS (optional count may be missing)

sentinelone_cloud_detection_rules.name: SentinelOne Cloud Detection Rules
sentinelone_cloud_detection_rules.description: Retrieve custom cloud detection rules, last alert times and update timestamps.
sentinelone_cloud_detection_rules.instructions: Script: clouddetectionrules.py. Calls /web/api/v2.1/cloud-detection/rules with cursor pagination, extracts lastAlertTime and updatedAt fields, writes JSON and CSV summary.

sentinelone_activities.name: SentinelOne Activities
sentinelone_activities.description: Retrieve SentinelOne activity events for a set of activity types (FedRAMP list) and summarize activity types and descriptions.
sentinelone_activities.instructions: Script: activityfetcher.py. Calls /web/api/v2.1/activities with activityTypes filter (cursor pagination), aggregates activityType counts and primary descriptions, writes JSON and CSV summary.

validationRules.logic: IF activity_type object exists THEN PASS
